flavor_text:
It uses its strong psychic power
to squeeze its opponent’s brain,
causing unendurable headaches.

This Pokémon had never been seen until
it appeared from far in the desert
50 years ago.

Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO
crash site in the desert 50 years ago.
